title: If You Spot These "Vintage" Cups at HomeGoods, Grab 3 Sets (They're $4 Each)
author: Nina Derwin

Eichelberger/ShutterstockJust like a spaghetti and meatballs dish is meant to pair with Chianti, and cabernet sauvignon is the perfect complement to a steak and baked potato, everybody knows that a crisp, cold Diet Coke goes with a Caesar salad and french fries.¬†And while you might think that there‚Äôs no way to possibly make this tried-and-true combo any better, HomeGoods is here to prove us all wrong. Because the only thing better than enjoying a Diet Coke with your salad and fries is sipping it from an adorable Diet Coke can-shaped glass.Shoppers recently spotted the supercute Diet Coke glasses on the shelves of HomeGoods, and now people all over the internet are racing to their closest store to bring home a set of their own. Priced at just $7.99, the glasses come in a set of two and look nearly identical to the classic Diet Coke cans, except in glass form, with the logo embossed on the side.While the glasses are definitely perfect for drinking Diet Coke, there‚Äôs no reason to stop there. They‚Äôre also a super fun way to enjoy your iced coffee or matcha in the mornings, or water with lemon to stay hydrated throughout the day.¬†‚ÄúI have these & can confirm they are great!!‚Äù commented one HomeGoods shopper. ‚ÄúThey fit a can of diet coke + ice perfectly ü•∫üòç‚Äù said another. ‚ÄúGoing to look for these tomorrow omg,‚Äù added a third. Other commenters pointed out that they‚Äôd stumbled upon the Diet Coke can glasses at T.J. Maxx, too.If your local HomeGoods doesn‚Äôt have them in stock, or if you don‚Äôt have a HomeGoods nearby, don‚Äôt worry. Amazon has a set of six glasses that are just perfectly can-shaped. The only difference is that instead of having the Diet Coke logo, they look like a can of regular Coca-Cola. While the set of six is a little more expensive, it‚Äôs still a great price for such fun and unique drinkware.More to Love from The Kitchn

Nina Derwin

Nina Derwin is a Brooklyn-based writer with a passion for the art of storytelling. In addition to writing articles for various clients and publications, Nina has written several episodes of scripted television for networks including Starz and Fox.

published now

We independently select these products‚Äîif you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Just like a spaghetti and meatballs dish is meant to pair with Chianti, and cabernet sauvignon is the perfect complement to a steak and baked potato, everybody knows that a crisp, cold Diet Coke goes with a Caesar salad and french fries.¬†

And while you might think that there‚Äôs no way to possibly make this tried-and-true combo any better, HomeGoods is here to prove us all wrong. Because the only thing better than enjoying a Diet Coke with your salad and fries is sipping it from an adorable Diet Coke can-shaped glass.

Shoppers recently spotted the supercute Diet Coke glasses on the shelves of HomeGoods, and now people all over the internet are racing to their closest store to bring home a set of their own. Priced at just $7.99, the glasses come in a set of two and look nearly identical to the classic Diet Coke cans, except in glass form, with the logo embossed on the side.

While the glasses are definitely perfect for drinking Diet Coke, there‚Äôs no reason to stop there. They‚Äôre also a super fun way to enjoy your iced coffee or matcha in the mornings, or water with lemon to stay hydrated throughout the day.¬†

‚ÄúI have these & can confirm they are great!!‚Äù commented one HomeGoods shopper. ‚ÄúThey fit a can of diet coke + ice perfectly ü•∫üòç‚Äù said another. ‚ÄúGoing to look for these tomorrow omg,‚Äù added a third. Other commenters pointed out that they‚Äôd stumbled upon the Diet Coke can glasses at T.J. Maxx, too.

If your local HomeGoods doesn‚Äôt have them in stock, or if you don‚Äôt have a HomeGoods nearby, don‚Äôt worry. Amazon has a set of six glasses that are just perfectly can-shaped. The only difference is that instead of having the Diet Coke logo, they look like a can of regular Coca-Cola. While the set of six is a little more expensive, it‚Äôs still a great price for such fun and unique drinkware.
